channel.title: [Rsm]Movement
channel.description:
[center]Hi, I'm wondering. I've been adding some models to my client. I've added the new look of the greater/lesser demon. It's fine when it's just stood but when it moves around the entire body stretches in different directions.
If anyone knows how to fix this problem, please. [b]Post.[/b][/center]
[b]-Devilicious[/b]

item.title: [Rsm]Movement

item.description:
@Devilicious wrote:

Hm, i’m not too sure. [b]:[/b].

Read full topic
